A really nice looking Obak up for sale:

1910 T212-2 Coy SGC 30 – A New Standard - $OLD
1910 T212-2 Martinke SGC 40 – Always with Mouthpieces - [STRIKE]$40[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$35[/STRIKE]  [STRIKE]$30[/STRIKE]  $OLD

Price includes shipping. Paypal gift preferred, but checks and money orders accepted as well. PM if interested. 

"I'll take it" trumps any ongoing negotiations.

Thanks for checking in, Steve
Bump for price reduction on last card!
Lowered the price on Martinke SGC 40. Sharp looking card!!
Bump for "get him sold" pricing. I really don't want to use ebay guys!! :D
